Articles.Content:
This is an idea I have been planning on doing for a while, very simply you post a craft in the replies(like Kerbal regional jets or dog-fighting tournaments) say if it is stock, vanilla or modded, give a version of the game, and explain a little bit about it. the craft posted here can be used by anyone and can be modified for free. kerbalx exists for craft sharing, but I just thought it would be cool to have a forum thread collecting ships that you are free to modify.

Edited November 11, 2019 by lapis
